name: Mocean
description:
This was a quick study in visual effects in Unity.

Move the koi fish through the pond environment and collect food to get a quick speed boost!

No audio yet, it'll come...probably

KEYBOARD CONTROLS
========

W/S - angle up and down
A/D - turn left and right
Space - move forward
Esc - Exit application

COLLABORATORS:

Jonathan Cioletti - https://joncioletti.com/
